alert.note: Alert for Clay; Dickinson; Geary; Lyon; Morris; Pottawatomie; Riley; Wabaunsee (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 21 at 8:18PM CDT until June 21 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Dickinson County in central Kansas... Geary County in east central Kansas... Riley County in northeastern Kansas... Morris County in east central Kansas... Western Wabaunsee County in east central Kansas... Southwestern Pottawatomie County in northeastern Kansas... Southern Clay County in north central Kansas... Northwestern Lyon County in east central Kansas... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 817 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles west of Wakefield to 3 miles east of Grandview Plaza to 3 miles north of Wilsey, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Manhattan, Junction City, Council Grove, Alma, Ogden, Grandview Plaza, Wakefield, Riley, St. George, White City, Milford, Leonardville, Alta Vista, Dwight, McFarland, Wilsey, Parkerville, Bushong, Latimer and Milford Lake. This includes Interstate 70 between mile markers 289 and 330. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Clay; Dickinson; Geary; Lyon; Morris; Pottawatomie; Riley; Wabaunsee
